content: where s the best place to display colorful round pumpkins beside colorful round doors of course these pumpkins are a fun quick knit they are knit in the round on dpns from the bottom to the top the cast off end is used to shape the pumpkin and to help it lay flat i used worsted but they look great in sock or fingering too feel like your backyard needs a hobbit hole click here for my backyard hobbit hole pattern 1 i hope you enjoy this free pattern happy knitting natasha > **praise for fairytale pumpkin** > > these are cutest and easiest pumpkins > to make tinpins 2 > > this pattern is easy to follow and > delivers instant gratification > mallacrochet 3 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/hobbit-hole-fairy-doors 2 https //www ravelry com/projects/tinpins/fairytale-pumpkins 3 https //www ravelry com/projects/mallacrochet/fairytale-pumpkins
